Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
DiaryProject.StringUtils
public class StringUtils extends Object
Utility class for managing the texts in program.

  • Method Details

    • checkString

      public static boolean checkString(String text)
      Checks if String isn't null or empty.
      Parameters:
      text - Input that needs to check.
      Returns:
      true if isn't null and empty, false otherwise.

    • askForString

      public static String askForString(String text_message, Scanner scan)
      Shows a message for asking an input.
      Parameters:
      text_message - Message that shows to user.
      scan - The Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      user's input.
